name: Tiny Necromancer
description:
This was created for the Nokia 3310 Jam 3 PREMISE

You play as the Tiny Necromancer. You have been tasked by your patron to take down the mighty White Paladin without being smote. The only weapon you have, is your wand and the ability to raise the dead. Be weary.

CONTROLS

Enter - Advance Screen

W/A/S/D/Arrow Keys - Move the Necromancer

Spacebar - Summon undead
